profile:
Cleanup & Restoration Services 

Several accidents and weather events cause property damage. At Paul Davis we confront this damage each day. We acknowledge that every call we receive is different and will utilize the tools and resources that are necessary to have it fixed professionally.
*
Water Damage: From broken pipes to severe flooding, there are numerous causes of water damage. Sometimes it is contained to a single room, while other times it can inflict damage on the whole property. To help you on the road to recovery after a water damage incident, our services include water extraction, structural repairs, and contents cleaning.
*
Fire and Smoke Damage: A fire in your home or business will result in three major problems: burned materials and belongings, smoke damage, and flood damage. Our professional equipment allows us to restore a surprisingly large amount of fire-damaged content. We’ll also remove water and eliminate the odours caused by smoke.
*
Weather Damage: After damage from weather events like ice storms and hail, careful repairs will be needed. Our restoration specialists will answer the call with our clean services.
*
Mould Removal: 
Mould is a major health concern that should be dealt with immediately. We won’t stop after cleaning the areas that have a visible mould problem. We’ll take the necessary steps to prevent future growth of mould through extensive sanitation.
*
Contents Cleaning: A building isn’t the only thing that is damaged during an event like this, as there many business and personal belongings that can seem ruined and lost forever. Please talk to your local Paul Davis System before you throw these items away. With the latest cleaning technology, we are able to restore clothing, documents, furniture, and other heavily damaged items.
*
Call Paul Davis for more information on our other services, including cleanup for sewer backup damage, ice damming, and asbestos.
You can count on our team being at your property within two hours.
services: Emergency Restoration Services, for damages caused from fire, smoke, broken pipes,floods, vehicle impacts, wind, hail and storms
